head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DONATI, GRACE FOX

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DONATI, GRACE FOX

block.p: DONATI-Grace Fox. Age 36 on April 30 after a short illness. Beloved daughter of Robert and Georgia Donati of Scarsdale, New York, cherished sister of Sylvia & Ellen Donati. Freelance journalist. Graduate of Columbia Journalism School, Wesleyan University. Worked at Dow Jones, WNYC, Crains NY Business and international Center in New York. Memorial service at 11 A.M. on Saturday, May 6 at Hitchcock Presbyterian Church, 6 Greenacres Avenue, Scarsdale, New York.
